memberdef.name: GetSteamWorkshopMissions

briefdescription.para: Calls SteamManager to query Steam Workshop for items. When the query is completed onSteamQueryCallback will be called with the results.

parameterdescription.para: Callback to calling class once the steam query is completed
The Steam API query type
An array of Steam workshop tags the results are to match

briefdescription.para: Will be called from SteamManager when a workshop query run from GetSteamWorkshopMissions is complete. Will then call back to onSteamQueryComplete that is passed into GetSteamWorkshopMissions.
